title: My account has been erased?
body: Ive logged onto my account usuing my details etc and then it tries to make me to the tutrorial and it shows that my level is level 1, im so confused please help

replies.body:
It's possible your region has reset in the client. Check is that you are logging into OCE and not some other region (typically NA is the default).

Failing that, submit a ticket to player support and they can look into it in more detail: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
